OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

ocplib-endian

  • 0.2
  • version 0.3
  • 0.4
Homepage https://github.com/OCamlPro/ocplib-endian
Maintainer contact@ocamlpro.com
Dependencies ocamlfind & optcomp & camlp4
Last update May 15, 2014
Source https://github.com/OCamlPro/ocplib-endian/archive/0.3.tar.gz
28ad3fd680a59e3341d68315bc7b79a3

Optimised functions to read and write int16/32/64 from strings and bigarrays, based on new primitives added in version 4.01.

The library implements two modules:

  • EndianString works directly on strings, and provides submodules BigEndian and LittleEndian, with their unsafe counter-parts;

  • EndianBigstring works on bigstrings (Bigarrays of chars), and provides submodules BigEndian and LittleEndian, with their unsafe counter-parts;

Dependencies
camlp4
optcomp
ocamlfind
Required by
alberto
cstruct
lwt-binio
websocket
